attributes.action: Allow learner drivers to practise with members of their household/support bubble
attributes.additional_details: The change in the law not allowing learners to practise driving with members of their household or support bubble, will have a massive negative impact on our progress and road confidence. As a learner with my test booked for March, driving with a member of my household is my only means to practice and build up my confidence on the road.
attributes.background: For learners living in Scotland or Wales they can legally practise driving with members of their household or support bubble. I would like the Government to change the law to allow learners in England to do the same.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/559063

Under current Government guidance, you can practise driving with members of your household or support bubble. It must be travel for work, education or other essential journeys: https://www.gov.uk/driving-lessons-learning-to-drive/practising-with-family-or-friends
